price: We have sought to reach heaven but found it filled with stern guards and flaming fire.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
